entity_action.description: The action to execute on the player.
entity_action.markdownDescription: The action to execute on the player.

type.description:
[Power Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/action_on_land)

Executes an [Entity Action Type](../entity_action_types.md) when the player lands on the ground after being airborne.

Type ID: `origins:action_on_land`
